xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 10 July 2013
xwikidoc.content: <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 08:18 <ravigarg27> hey sdumitriu, need your help 08:18 <ravigarg27> badly stuck at one place 08:28 <sdumitriu> Hey ravigarg27 08:28 <sdumitriu> SHoot 08:30 <ravigarg27> umm the ctakes component class never gets called this is my CtakesService.xml http://pastebin.com/k7AYtanw and the component class is this http://pastebin.com/kXASpsEa 08:31 <sdumitriu> Who is AbstractScriptService? 08:31 <ravigarg27> http://pastebin.com/nyTkVngj 08:31 <sdumitriu> Then, did you register the components in src/main/resources/META-INF/components.txt? 08:32 <ravigarg27> yup 08:32 <sdumitriu> OK, anything wrong displayed in the console? 08:32 <ravigarg27> only need to register the CtakesScriptService right? 08:33 <sdumitriu> Yes 08:33 <ravigarg27> no infact it gives the response but empty 08:33 <sdumitriu> OK, so the component is active, just that it doesn't work as expected 08:34 <sdumitriu> Why do you call super.initialize()? 08:34 <ravigarg27> not required? 08:34 <sdumitriu> No 08:34 <ravigarg27> ohhk I actually didn't had it before 08:34 <sdumitriu> The initialize method is called automatically by the component manager when creating the instance 08:35 <sdumitriu> Which method doesn't work? 08:35 <ravigarg27> nothing gets called actually 08:35 <ravigarg27> I had put breakpoint at very start of extract 08:36 <ravigarg27> but I think the component doesn't get called only 08:36 <ravigarg27> I tried both putting super.initialize() as well as without it 08:38 <sdumitriu> What does this print: {{velocity}}$services.ctakes{{/velocity}} 08:39 <ravigarg27> okay I will try that 08:42 <ravigarg27> $console.log($services.ctakes) in CtakesService.xml right? 08:42 <sdumitriu> No 08:42 <sdumitriu> Exactly what I said 08:42 <sdumitriu> There is no $console 08:45 <ravigarg27> need to put that in CtakesService.xml only right? 08:45 <sdumitriu> In any document 08:45 <sdumitriu> It's a small test 08:46 <sdumitriu> Just edit a new document in a running PhenoTips instance 08:46 <ravigarg27> the same gets printed 08:46 <ravigarg27> when I put in that xml file 08:47 <sdumitriu> Same what? 08:49 <ravigarg27> this is the response which I get http://pastebin.com/aaifYWxk 08:50 <sdumitriu> Did you include the jar in the final package? 08:50 <sdumitriu> Does it appear in webapps/phenotips/WEB-INF/xml? 08:50 <sdumitriu> Does it appear in webapps/phenotips/WEB-INF/lib? 08:53 <ravigarg27> umm nopes its not there in lib 08:53 <ravigarg27> what did I miss 08:53 <sdumitriu> Declare a dependency in the war module 08:56 <ravigarg27> ah, so silly of me 08:56 <ravigarg27> thanx 08:56 <ravigarg27> no way I could have found this 19:32 <phenotips_org> has joined #ccm
